full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Cups and Lids for Insect Rearing

**Reference Number:** WS3717886111-DOC3717977532
**Publication Date:** 2022-10-26
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-14T14:00:00 EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2022-11-08
**Expected Contract End Date:** None

## Tender Description
[Amendment to Closing Time: The closing time has been extended to November 14, 2022 at 14:00 EST. All bids must be submitted by this time to be considered.]

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) is issuing a tender for the supply and delivery of cups and lids for insect rearing. The Insect Production and Quarantine Laboratories (IPQL) at the Great Lakes Forestry Centre in Sault Ste. Marie require 0.5 million transparent or translucent cups with corresponding tabbed paper or cardboard lids. These cups and lids will be used for insect rearing and growth.

## Tender Status
The tender status is **Expired**, however please note the amendment to the closing time.

## Technical Specifications
The required cups and lids must meet the following specifications:

* 0.5 million transparent or translucent cups made of 8-10oz material
* 0.5 million corresponding tabbed paper or cardboard lids

## Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan).

## End User
The end-user is the Insect Production and Quarantine Laboratories (IPQL) at the Great Lakes Forestry Centre in Sault Ste. Marie.

## Procurement Method
The procurement method is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN).

## Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Contact Information
For further information, please contact Liao, Guo (SPAC/PSPC) at guo.liao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
